resources.string: Press Home button to close application.
Create profiles to control the time of every aspect of your day to day. Control your working hours, the time spent studying, working, in field service, sleeping, watching TV, etc …
The \"%s\" name for the time\'s profile is invalid.
Enter the name to the new time\'s profile:
The \"%s\" time\'s profile was added and selected.
Enter the new name to \"%s\" time\' profile:
The \"%s\" time\'s profile was renamed to \"%s\".
This action will delete the selected \"%s\" time\'s profile. That is irreversible.
All time\'s profiles were deleted. A new profile was added as default.
Enter the name for the new time\'s profile to be a copy of the \"%s\" profile:
The \"%s\" time\'s profile was duplicated as \"%s\".
Enter the path where the \"%s\" time\'s profile will be exported:
The \"%s\" time\'s profile was exported to \"%s\"
Unable to export the time\'s profile to the path entered.
View the welcome screen when starting the application.
Path where data and settings are saved:
The path to record data and configuações is invalid or inaccessible.
This action will save the list of configurations reported in the above fields. The operation of the application is based on these definitions.
The settings have been successfully saved.

This action DOES NOT CAUSE LOSS OF DATA that you registered in Marca Ponto. Only the Marca Ponto\'s settings are reset as were the first time you ran it.\n \n But pay attention: If you modified the location where Marca Ponto\'s files are stored, you must reconfigure it again. Otherwise, you can not view the data that you have registered.
This action will restore the original settings of the application.
It\'s awesome!\nThe Marca Ponto will facilitate their control of schedules.\n

Can you remember about the 1.0 version?
	It' gone… Now we even have a new icon!

	I had some problems to update it for this new version. In fact the problems were concentrated in my Google account, which by the way had to change.

	In this version of Marca Ponto I focused on implementing the same functionality from previous version. However, I am already working on implementing the successive versions with the suggestions I have received in the e-mail quoted above.

	Hope you enjoy.
	Cheers, Sergio Cabral.

The path where the data and settings are saved (%s) is not currently accessible.\n\nMaybe the device has been connected to the computer and USB mass storage is enabled. If this is the case, disable the USB mass storage.
The profile (%s) could not be loaded.\n\nMaybe the device has been connected to the computer and USB mass storage is enabled. If this is the case, disable the USB mass storage.
The profile (%s) could not be created.\n\nMaybe the device has been connected to the computer and USB mass storage is enabled. If this is the case, disable the USB mass storage.
